thread.title: Report: Hungary targeting George Soros and foreign-backed NGOs in the name of transparency
thread.title_full: Report: Hungary targeting George Soros and foreign-backed NGOs in the name of transparency

author: William A.
title: Report: Hungary targeting George Soros and foreign-backed NGOs in the name of transparency
text:
Report: Hungary targeting George Soros and foreign-backed NGOs in the name of transparency Posted at 12:03 am on March 8, 2017 by William A. 
Lili Bayer of Politico has this report out of Hungary: Hungarian planned law targets Soros, foreign-backed NGOs. My article today for @POLITICOEurope https://t.co/n5HT0dlW0A #Hungary 
Bayer writes : 
Prime Minister Viktor Orbán has long been critical of the Open Society and foreign-funded NGOs, but his government’s attacks have intensified of late. 
“Hungary cannot afford to allow organizations that remain in the shadows — not declaring who they receive their money from and for what purposes — to continuously encourage migrants to break Hungarian law to somehow get into the country,” said Orbán in a radio address on February 24, adding that “by doing so, international organizations which are primarily linked to George Soros have overstepped a line.” 
Obviously, Soros knows a thing or two about funding political organizations to push his agenda: Sen. Sessions shows little knowledge of and empathy for the people he'd be entrusted to protect as attorney general. https://t.co/Z5I0NZKnO4 
— George Soros (@georgesoros) January 16, 2017 A new Open Society initiative offers support to organizations dealing with acts of hate. https://t.co/uHkd8M2583 
— George Soros (@georgesoros) January 5, 2017 Defend open society in 2017 https://t.co/MfDREUyND1 
— George Soros (@georgesoros) January 3, 2017 We must do something to push back against the rise of hate crimes in the U.S. https://t.co/PQiWkU1US1 
— George Soros (@georgesoros) November 23, 2016 Trending
